seo.title: SnapMedia - Cross-Platform Media Downloader | Supports 15+ platforms including YouTube, TikTok, Instagram
seo.description: SnapMedia is a free, cross-platform media downloader that supports video and audio downloads from 15+ popular platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, and Bilibili. Fast, secure, and without watermarks.

header.title: Cross-Platform Media Downloader
header.subtitle: Get your favorite content with one click

queue.title: Processing Queue
queue.detected_separate_streams: Detected {service} separate streams, preparing for front-end merge...
queue.stream_url_fetch_failed: Failed to get audio and video stream URLs
queue.stream_download_failed: Audio/video stream download failed - Video: {video_status}, Audio: {audio_status}
queue.data_processing_complete: Data processing complete, preparing to merge...
queue.merge_failed_downloading_separately: Merge failed, downloading video and audio separately...
queue.downloaded_separately: Video and audio files have been downloaded separately
queue.stream_download_failed_error: Download failed: unable to get audio/video files

preview.title: Video Preview
preview.unsupported_video: Your browser does not support video playback
preview.proxy_video_unavailable_desc: SnapMedia proxy may require special handling
preview.preview_unavailable_desc: Some platform videos need to be downloaded directly
preview.download_instead: Click the button below to download directly
preview.merge_info: YouTube video downloads contain two separate files:
preview.video_file_desc: (no audio) - used for the preview above
preview.merge_required: You need to merge these two files using video editing software.
preview.single_file_detected: Single media file detected, click to download and save.
preview.single_file_desc: This is a complete media file and requires no extra processing.
preview.multiple_files_detected: Multiple files detected, will be downloaded separately.

toast.browser_merging_streams: üé¨ Browser smart merging: processing {service} audio and video...

toast.browser_merge_failed_downloading_separat: ‚ö†Ô∏è Browser merge failed, will download video and audio separately

error_messages.rate_limit: Request too frequent, please try again later
error_messages.api_fetch_timeout: Request timeout, please check network connection
error_messages.api_fetch_error: Network error, please try again later

error_messages.error_api_fetch_short_link: Facebook short links are not supported, please use the full Facebook link
error_messages.unknown_error_context: Failed to get video info, please check if the link is correct

download_settings.title: Download Settings
download_settings.media_processing_mode_description_html:
üéØ Smart Select: YouTube, Bilibili use browser merge, other platforms use server merge
üîß Browser Merge: All platforms synthesize video and audio in the browser (fast, uses memory)
üåê Server Merge: All platforms synthesize on the server side (saves memory, may be slower)
‚ö° Hybrid Mode: Smartly selects processing method based on file type
download_settings.always_proxy_title: When enabled, all downloads will be proxied through the server, which can solve some regional restriction issues, but the download speed may be slower
download_settings.proxy_description_html:
üí° Proxy Settings Description:
‚Ä¢ üöÄ Direct Mode (default): Download directly from the source, fastest speed
‚Ä¢ üõ°Ô∏è Proxy Mode: Transfer through the server, can bypass anti-hotlinking and regional restrictions, but slower
‚Ä¢ üìã Usage Scenario: Enable proxy when download fails, regional restrictions, or anti-hotlinking prevents download

data_management.title: Data Management
data_management.reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will clear all custom configurations.

hello_world.message_1: You‚Äôve successfully created a project with

documentation.heading: Documentation
documentation.body_html: Vue‚Äôs official documentation provides you with all information you need to get started.

tooling.heading: Tooling
tooling.body_html_1: This project is served and bundled with Vite. The recommended IDE setup is VSCode + Vue - Official. If you need to test your components and web pages, check out Vitest and Cypress / Playwright.

ecosystem.heading: Ecosystem
ecosystem.body_html: Get official tools and libraries for your project: Pinia, Vue Router, Vue Test Utils, and Vue Dev Tools. If you need more resources, we suggest paying Awesome Vue a visit.

community.heading: Community
community.body_html: Got stuck? Ask your question on Vue Land (our official Discord server), or StackOverflow. You should also follow the official @vuejs.org Bluesky account or the @vuejs X account for latest news in the Vue world.

support.heading: Support Vue
support.body_html: As an independent project, Vue relies on community backing for its sustainability. You can help us by becoming a sponsor.
